The CEF and coexisting Kondo interactions in this heavy fermion compound arrange a hierarchy of magnetic moments, from the free ion value ( m ( Yb 3 + ) = 4 μ B ) to the CEF driven score, m Y b C E F = 3 . 55 μ B and finally to m Y b N P D = 3 . 04 μ B owing to the demagnifying impact of the Kondo effect.
